## 3. Volcano in Ethiopia erupts for first time in nearly 12,000 years: "It felt like a sudden bomb" - CBS News

**来源：** CBS News  
**时间：** Mon, 24 Nov 2025 17:00:00 GMT  
**分类：** crypto  
**语言：** en  

### 摘要

## 4. G20 declaration in defiance of US marks rare victory for multilateralism - Reuters

**来源：** Reuters  
**时间：** Mon, 24 Nov 2025 15:34:37 GMT  
**分类：** crypto  
**语言：** en  

### 摘要

<ol><li><a href="https://news.google.com/rss/articles/CBMisAFBVV95cUxOQklwNHFiOHU3LTVncWNxNVhPaVpDNlJPRUZROHE4NFhFX3MxaVQycWltaU9Ta2wzM0NjNnQ5LURUa244X2VUVGxkS25kVGlPZzRjeko3ZFpBVXJzOVpWX21VaTMyRFhBbnBLcnoydExoU1FudnZmeXM1V2I5ODU1RF9yU1NNNFlfcW1ndEYwbWkwS1c4RENlcDhTYWRaRk1MSWpWcVEwVnVTNkZUT3g1MA?oc=5" target="_blank">G20 declaration in defiance of US marks rare victory for multilateralism</a>&nbsp;&nbsp;<font color="#6f6f6f">Reuters</font></li><li><a href="https://news.google.com/rss/articles/CBMihAFBVV95cUxNUTlBQ2FSSjNjOUpmQVZDTm5iVGx4M3hqc3paMlViUVJIcEczUzZKUF9yeHc2T0huWVo4MmpxTHNPZzhtWXlNbFExbk9nb2lwdm51Tk00OHJuTHpyMFl5dUl3bXBEVUdjeXpjdTdud2VnVzlJb3Job2tMUjZ1ZzVsQXJMT1c?oc=5" target="_blank">The G20 summit in South Africa ends with the glaring absence of the US after Trump’s boycott</a>&nbsp;&nbsp;<font color="#6f6f6f">CNN</font></li><li><a href="https://news.google.com/rss/articles/CBMie0FVX3lxTFBmOWVKNV95U0tTLTQ1akJtcURSRWpybkx5YmNMOGJXMFRVT2wtbVFaTDQzNkgyMnByM3JkYS1kVHFzTDF2UUViQmFHRHBaSGdMQ3Z3WU5iYm5id2EteExTZFRFaGtXN01mMmJkdXlGdm1TYTNTX0dzQ0h2MA?oc=5" target="_blank">Macron, who called NATO brain dead, warns of end to G-20</a>&nbsp;&nbsp;<font color="#6f6f6f">Fortune</font></li><li><a href="https://news.google.com/rss/articles/CBMicEFVX3lxTE1XYUZfSnhEN0IzdU5pU0g1endpUEVCNXR2RTRldERnWWxmMUY3ZUtXTkJWVllsaUhxcVA1OGhFbEFRaWRtcGlyU0s0Tzd0YVpFNlMxU1JGVGVZSkIwVjQ3b01mM0tSM3lIZk9GbTE1UGw?oc=5" target="_blank">G20 defies Trump as leaders press on without US</a>&nbsp;&nbsp;<font color="#6f6f6f">Financial Times</font></li><li><a href="https://news.google.?oc=5" target="_blank">S Africa says G20 shared goals outweigh differences as it concludes summit</a>&nbsp;&nbsp;<font color="#6f6f6f">Al Jazeera</font></li></ol>

## 6. 'Scary, cold, hungry and lonely': Volunteer soldier shares experience on front line

**来源：** CNN.com - RSS Channel - App International Edition  
**时间：** Mon, 03 Apr 2023 12:13:24 GMT  
**分类：** crypto  
**语言：** en  

### 摘要

A young volunteer soldier, Akula, who signed up for the war at the beginning of the Russian invasion is now dealing with the trauma of war. He spoke to CNN's David McKenzie about his time on the front lines and how it has affected his mental health.

### 相关图片

![图片](https://media.cnn.com/api/v1/images/stellar/prod/230327100109-ptsd-soldier-ukraine.jpg?c=16x9&q=w_1280,c_fill)
![图片](https://media.cnn.com/api/v1/images/stellar/prod/230327100109-ptsd-soldier-ukraine.jpg?c=16x9&q=w_250,c_fill)
![图片](https://media.cnn.com/api/v1/images/stellar/prod/240427065114-tah-kuleba-blinken.jpg?c=16x9&q=w_250,c_fill)
![图片](https://media.cnn.com/api/v1/images/stellar/prod/240422202326-russia-1-mtg-vpx.jpg?c=16x9&q=w_250,c_fill)
![图片](https://media.cnn.com/api/v1/images/stellar/prod/240424080321-mitch-mcconnell.jpg?c=16x9&q=w_250,c_fill)
